summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of low-end device optimizations for Motorola G 2021, including UI corrections, haptic optimizations, and new widget functionality. All 50 tests passed with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: useResponsive Hook: isLowEndDevice flag properly detects devices with screen width < 360px or height < 700px
useResponsive Hook: tabBarPadding() function returns 75px for small phones, 100px for iOS, 85px for Android
useResponsive Hook: All 5 responsive breakpoints defined (verySmallPhone: 320, smallPhone: 360, phone: 375, largePhone: 414, tablet: 768)
useResponsive Hook: isLowEndDevice properly exported and available
Haptic Optimization: DoorCard regular press haptic disabled for better performance, long press still has feedback
Haptic Optimization: HapticButton regular press haptic disabled, only for important actions
Haptic Optimization: AnimatedThemeSwitch regular click haptic disabled
Haptic Optimization: PrimaryButton regular press haptic disabled, only for unlock actions
Layout Fix: DoorControlScreen ACTIONS_BOTTOM_MARGIN uses tabBarPadding() + 10
Layout Fix: DoorControlScreen actions use ACTIONS_BOTTOM_MARGIN to prevent tab bar overlap
Layout Fix: DoorControlScreen integrates isLowEndDevice for responsive design
Layout Fix: App.js responsive tab bar height (52px for low-end devices vs 64px normal)
Layout Fix: App.js responsive tab bar margins (12px for low-end vs 20px normal)
Layout Fix: App.js responsive icon (18px) and label (9px) sizes for low-end devices

WidgetService: All 9 async methods properly implemented (setPrimaryDoor, getPrimaryDoor, syncWidgetData, isWidgetReady, setWidgetEnabled, isWidgetEnabled, authenticateForWidget, quickUnlock, clearWidgetData)
WidgetService: WIDGET_KEYS constants defined for AsyncStorage management
WidgetService: LocalAuthentication integration for biometric authentication
WidgetService: Properly exported as singleton instance
WidgetSettingsScreen: All required imports present (WidgetService, Switch, SafeAreaView)
WidgetSettingsScreen: All state variables properly defined (doors, primaryDoor, widgetEnabled, loading)
WidgetSettingsScreen: All key functions implemented (handleToggleWidget, handleSelectDoor, handleTestUnlock)
WidgetSettingsScreen: Complete UI components (Switch for enable/disable, TouchableOpacity for door selection, Test unlock button)
AccountScreen: WidgetSettings navigation properly implemented
AccountScreen: Widget Settings menu button with Smartphone icon added
AccountScreen: Smartphone icon imported from lucide-react-native
Navigation Integration: WidgetSettingsScreen imported in App.js
Navigation Integration: WidgetSettings route added to AccountStack
